channel.title: Moparscape client download
channel.description: hmmm...i have plain' mopar since 2006 and i wonder why doesn't mopar work on my new computer...(i mean the web client) ok i desired to download the client but now i understand that the download thing is well hided...(i can't download it from the links at the download page)Where can i find the download things to download it straightly...??? :o

item.title: Moparscape client download
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“laveerre, post:6, topic:119138”]ooooooooops!
that’s one reason more why it should be usefull to read the rules…
i’m sorry every ,one i’m really that…
i will go to the real site with my ‘‘Moparscape crap’’
thats the only WHY IS THE SITE NAME MOPARISTHEBEST if it hasn’t anything to do with the game…lol[/quote]

The website actually has more to do than moparscape than you think, originally, moparscape had it’s own category here under Main Category, but EVERYONE asked about it in the Questions board, so after a few dirty php hacks, managed to have 2 forums running off of 1 database so we could log on to both sites at once.

Either way, over the past year or so, us primarily MITB(short for Mopar Is The Best)'ers redirected people to moparisthebest.com(that soon became the webclient homepage so it’s now moparisthebest.com/smf) but some immature brats(even me, long ago) flamed the odd one that didn’t help himself and was unmannered, either way at least you made an effort to be nice. The moderation team and staff welcome you back.

Read full topic
